title: E-learning Platform Redesign
summary: Improving the digital learning experience for students and educators through user-centered design

phases.title: User Research
phases.summary: During the research phase, I focused on understanding the real needs of educational platform users. This phase was crucial for establishing solid foundations for the complete system redesign.

phases.title: Problem Definition
phases.summary: Based on insights obtained during research, I clearly defined the problem to solve and established specific objectives for the redesign.

phases.title: Solution Ideation
phases.summary: The ideation phase focused on generating multiple creative solutions for identified problems, using various brainstorming and co-creation techniques with key project stakeholders.

phases.title: Solution Design
phases.summary: I transformed selected concepts into tangible and functional solutions, creating detailed wireframes, interactive prototypes and the complete design system for the new educational platform.

phases.title: Validation and Testing
phases.summary: The final phase was dedicated to validating designed solutions through exhaustive testing with real users, iterating and refining based on results and feedback obtained in each session.
